channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Treasure Champs
channel.desc: Kindness. In an attempt to apologise to Kari for eating the cake she made him as a surprise, Barry tries to be kind in lots of different ways by becoming Captain Kind Kid.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Bluey
channel.desc: Typewriter. Bluey, Snickers and Winton are ambushed by the Terriers on the way to see Calypso.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Big Lizard
channel.desc: Crystals! Big Lizard has found an epic crystal, and Cosima is jealous. Their squabbling reaches its peak at the top of the volcano! Will they learn to share before it's too late.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Andy and the Band - Rock Star School
channel.desc: Dance Like Nobody's Watching. Blu's dance skills are put to the test in front of a celebrity judge.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: JoJo & Gran Gran
channel.desc: It's Time to Catch the Bus. JoJo and Gran Gran miss their bus home, so the pair settle down to wait for the next one. But getting the bus isn't quite as simple as JoJo thinks it is.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Puffin Rock
channel.desc: The Sad Whale. Oona and Silky help a whale find its family.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Sarah & Duck
channel.desc: Decorating Donkey. Animation. It is nearly time for Tortoise to wake up from hibernation, so Sarah plans a pretty surprise.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Charlie and Lola
channel.desc: I Really, Really Need Actual Ice Skates. Children's animation. Lola wants to become the best ice skater in the whole school, but first she needs to get ice skates to practise.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Clangers
channel.desc: Strange Music. The eggbot crash lands on the Clangers' Planet and shakes the notes off the music trees.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: In the Night Garden
channel.desc: Upsy Daisy's Big Loud Sing Song. Series for young children about a magical place. Upsy Daisy sings through her megaphone. The Pontipines cover their ears - what loud singing.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: CBeebies Bedtime Stories
channel.desc: Pixie Lott - It's Time to Hush and Say Goodnight. Pixie Lott takes us on a dreamlike journey in this mesmerising Bedtime Story.
